title: R42121
content: This report provides background data on U.S. arms sales agreements and deliveries to major purchasers from 2003-2010. It includes total dollar values of arms agreements and deliveries with top five purchasers in specific regions for different periods. Data is from the United States Defense Department and has been restructured for this report. The report covers U.S. arms sales agreements and deliveries from 2003-2010, detailing total dollar values of agreements with top purchasers in specific regions for calendar years. Tables provide values of defense articles and services sold to top purchasers globally and regionally. The report details U.S. arms sales agreements and deliveries from 2003-2010, focusing on the total dollar values of agreements with top purchasers in specific regions for calendar years. It excludes commercial licensed deliveries and provides the total dollar values of all U.S. defense articles and services delivered to the top 10 purchasers worldwide under the U.S. Foreign Military Sales (FMS) program.
